page.title: 14Farming in Abercynon
page.content: The main kinds of{farming}are{dairy} and {sheep}farming.TY-DU is lower than GARTH HALL.These are two of the farms in our block.The main kind of crop is grass but the lowland farm grows potatoes,sweeds,kale and rape,for the sheep.GARTH HALL has 40 milking cows,30 young cattle,500 breeding ewes,1 goat,1 pig and 16 piglets.TY-DU has 1670 breeding ewes,35 milking cows and 35 beef cattle.TY-DU FARM goes to NELSON,ABERGAVENY AND NEWPORT{MARKETS} GARTH HALLdoes not go to ABERGAVENY.Both farms use machinery but TY-DU has more becouse they grow more.The main problem on TY-DU are trespassing and dogs killing sheep but GARTH HALL'S main problem comes in times of drought when cattle are short of water.There are about 30 farms in our block and most of them are on high ground.
